## UIDirectionalLight.create() method

创建一个平行光

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
create( color : Color, dir : Vector3f, intensity : number) : UIDirectionalLight;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  color | [Color](./extractor.color.md) | 平行光的颜色 |
|  dir | [Vector3f](./extractor.vector3f.md) | 平行光的方向 |
|  intensity | number | 平行光的亮度  { module:UILight.UIDirectionalLight } |
